citation.case_name: Bank of America, N. A., Individually, and as Successor to Security Pacific National Bank v. Abraham and Norcal Waste Systems, Inc. v. Abraham

html:
535 U.S. 1015

BANK OF AMERICA, N. A., INDIVIDUALLY, AND AS SUCCESSOR TO SECURITY PACIFIC NATIONAL BANK
v.
ABRAHAM ET AL. and
NORCAL WASTE SYSTEMS, INC., ET AL.
v.
ABRAHAM ET AL.

No. 01-1179.

No. 01-1187.

Supreme Court of the United States.

April 22, 2002.

1

C. A. 9th Cir. The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in these cases expressing the views of the United States.
